lead_paragraph: Sterling hovered near a 10-month low on Tuesday and the cost of hedging against further weakness soared to three-year highs as investors worried about the potential impact of a Scottish vote for independence.

headline.main: Sterling Struggles as UK Split Worries Trump Carney's Rate Message
headline.print_headline: Sterling Struggles as UK Split Worries Trump Carney's Rate Message

snippet: Sterling hovered near a 10-month low on Tuesday and the cost of hedging against further weakness soared to three-year highs as investors worried about the potential impact of a Scottish vote for independence....
